video.title: Breakout Kings
video.synopsis: Tired of being hampered by the system, two U.S. Marshals hunt deadly criminals with help from the three most cunning ex-cons they ever captured.

episodes.synopsis: Two U.S. Marshals run a special task force that uses convicted felons to catch dangerous criminals who've escaped from prison.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Xavier Price escapes from prison in the midst of a candlelight vigil outside the penitentiary.
episodes.title: Collected

episodes.synopsis: T-bag, a sociopath with a prosthetic hand and a mean streak to go with it, makes a bloody escape from prison and sets out on a path of vengeance.
episodes.title: The Bag Man

episodes.synopsis: Joe, a convicted pedophile, disguises himself as a crewmember on a film shoot and makes a break for it.
episodes.title: Out of the Mouths of Babes

episodes.synopsis: The team tries to catch a ruthless woman, convicted of murdering her husband by stabbing him 48 times, who escaped from prison on a school bus.
episodes.title: Queen of Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Christian Beaumont doesn't just have an axe to grind with the prison system, he's got an axe to grind with the entire system of organized government.
episodes.title: Like Father, Like Son

episodes.synopsis: A modern-day Bonnie and Clyde escape from prison and go on a crime and killing spree.
episodes.title: Fun with Chemistry

episodes.synopsis: An oversized inmate is poisoned and his coffin is used as a "Trojan Horse" for two inmates to escape the Cayuga Correctional Facility.
episodes.title: Steaks

episodes.synopsis: Andre, a handsome, rich and cunning jewel thief, escapes from prison leaving all the prison guards scratching their heads.
episodes.title: One for the Money

episodes.synopsis: A notorious contract killer escapes from prison to carry out some unfinished business.
episodes.title: Paid in Full

episodes.synopsis: A violent schizophrenic with the skills of an outdoor survivalist and a history of ritualistic killing is off his meds and on the hunt.
episodes.title: Off the Beaten Path

episodes.synopsis: An 18-wheeler crashes into the prison wall, and an armored car escapes with several convicted felons hiding inside.
episodes.title: There Are Rules

episodes.synopsis: Carmen Vega, the ruthless queen of a drug cartel, pulls off a violent and deadly escape while attending the funeral of her slain son.
episodes.title: Where in the World Is Carmen Vega

episodes.synopsis: The team hunts a merciless serial killer that Lloyd's testimony helped convict, and Charlie is offered a promotion that may jeopardize the program.
episodes.title: An Unjust Death

episodes.synopsis: When a group of convicts tunnels to freedom, the team learns that one of the escapees is an undercover agent whose allegiance may be compromised.
episodes.title: Round Two

episodes.synopsis: When a re-captured snitch reveals his connection to a dangerous felon, the crook tries to head off his own arrest by kidnapping one of the team.
episodes.title: Double Down

episodes.synopsis: After receiving grim medical news, a gangbanger escapes prison and goes on a bizarre killing spree, pushing Ray to the limits of his authority.
episodes.title: Cruz Control

episodes.synopsis: Finding themselves perplexed, the gang works to puzzle out how a crafty self-help guru pulled off the perfect crime while remaining incarcerated.
episodes.title: Self Help

episodes.synopsis: The team races to track down a violent female prisoner and her accomplice, a prison volunteer who helped her stage a clever escape.
episodes.title: I Smell Emmy

episodes.synopsis: When a convicted killer learns that the love of his life had manipulated him into committing his crime, he escapes prison and abducts her.
episodes.title: Ain't Love (50) Grand?

episodes.synopsis: Hot on the trail of an enraged ex-Navy SEAL, the team uncovers disturbing secrets about the paramilitary contractor that used to employ the soldier.
episodes.title: SEALd Fate

episodes.synopsis: After using his skills to escape custody, a nimble circus performer goes on a cold-blooded killing spree while continuing to elude the team.
episodes.title: Freakshow

episodes.synopsis: Things get personal for the team when Damien kidnaps Ray's daughter and demands that they continue to play his game of cat-and-mouse.
episodes.title: Served Cold
